price: "E ó meu povo! Por certo, temo, por vós, o Dia da Chamada mútua,
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum yawma al-tanādi
